entry.title: Wide Awake And Dead
entry.summary:
Author: Ladynovagreen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,133Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 12

Summary: Prompt: It’s been a few months since Dick reopened Titan’s Tower, dragging Jason, Gar and Rachel in and destroying your peace. While Dick seems to focus more on Rachel and leave the boys to their own devices, you work to keep the tower running. At one point you accidentally walked in on Jason in the shower and squeaked before walking out. Jason wants to make sure you don’t give away anything private about what you saw.
